explanations.neural network: The paper mentions the use of a Back-Propagation (BP) neural network for identifying financial fraud data.
explanations.backpropagation: The paper explicitly refers to the Back-Propagation (BP) neural network, which uses backpropagation for training.
explanations.BP: The paper uses the BP neural network (Back-Propagation neural network) for fraud identification.
explanations.hidden layer: The paper discusses changing the accuracy of the number analysis of neurons and hidden layers in the BP neural network.
